main_topic.title: Clarification on LLM Usage and Constraints
main_topic.content: Can anyone confirm if we are permitted to use any LLM, provided it operates within the specified time and memory constraints? Additionally, are we allowed to use closed-source models, such as the GPT-4 API?

comments.author: Chris Deotte
comments.content: Yes, we can use any model. However during submit we do not have access to internet, so we cannot use GPT-4 but rather must upload a model's saved weights for submission. Furthermore since we are limited to 16GB VRAM and 100GB disk, we can only submit small LLM models.
